General.Name: Aptus Value Housing Finance India Limited
General.Description: Aptus Value Housing Finance India Limited operates as a home loan company in India. It offers home construction, purchase, renovation, and extension loans; and loans against property for construction and purchase; and credit shield and property insurance. The company serves the needs of self-employed low- and middle-income families from rural and semi urban areas. It also provides finance in the form of loan against immovable properties. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Chennai, India.
